overview: Dreams never die tells the extraordinary story of Yannick Bestaven, winner of the last Vendée Globe. The film is also enriched with portraits of personalities who have realized their dreams: Daniel Auteuil, Isabelle Autissier, Philippe Croizon, Bixente Lizarazu, Thomas Pesquet, Charline Picon, Erik Orsenna and many others. In this particular context, this documentary is a real "hymn to life" that will make the eyes of young and old children shine!
title: Les rêves ne meurent jamais
